change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 4/2010, effective January 14, 2010.

section.sectiontext: Upon the issuance of a Crown grant under section 48 of the Land Act, the Minister of Sustainable Resource Management may require the grantee to enter into a covenant that he and his successors in title will not dispose of the land granted separately from another designated parcel already owned by the grantee.
